tool.name: PAUSE2 Repeat Adder
tool.description: reopen+copy region based on a PAUSE result
tool.command:
pause_copy_region.py --galaxy --genome "${genome}" #if $genomic_region and $genomic_region is not "None": --genomic_region "${genomic_region}" #end if
#if $source.source_select=="file": --genomic_region "${source.region_file}" #else --genomic_region_start "${source.start}" --genomic_region_end "${source.end}" #end if
--repeat_fa "${repeat_fa}"
--repeat_fa_files_path "${repeat_fa.files_path}"
--repeat_fa_format "Fasta"
--repeat_fa_id "${repeat_fa.id}"

param.help: Region of the genome which is a repeat
param.label: genomic_region
param.name: genomic_region

param.help: Repeat region from PAUSE2 Analysis tool
param.label: region_file
param.name: region_file
